name: hypixel_guild
description: The ID of the Hypixel Guild you want the bot to get data for

name: ticket_category
description: The Discord channel category you want any new ticket channels to be added to

name: ticket_manager_role
description: The Discord role you want to be automatically added to tickets

name: verified_mc_role
description: The Discord role you want anyone with a verified Minecraft account to have

name: guild_member_role
description: The Discord role you want anyone who is a member of the Hypixel guild to have

name: non_guild_member_role
description: The Discord role you want anyone who is not a member of the Hypixel guild to have
